settings.content: This is the theme settings form for the Fashionopolism Responsive Shopify theme by [Underground Media](http://www.undergroundmedia.co.uk)

For Support contact us at: [create@undergroundmedia.co.uk](mailto:create@undergroundmedia.co.uk) or "how to" guides please see our support website... [View Website](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk/)
Change the values below to adjust the colors and various options of your theme - don't forget to click the save button when done.
Don't forget to visit our [Shopify Themes](http://www.shopifythemes.net) website for tips, tricks and blog updates
Your Opinion Matters. Please take the time to review Fashionopolism here [Add a review](https://themes.shopify.com/themes/fashionopolism/styles/empire)
When you launch - Send us a Tweet to @undergrndmedia We love to see what our customers have made from our themes

[](https://shopifyandyou.refersion.com/c/542) Need some additional help using Shopify? Take a look at [Shopify and You](https://shopifyandyou.refersion.com/c/542) An easy-to-use, step-by-step ebook that covers everything you need to know about designing, setting up and running a truly awesome online store with Shopify.

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (Do tell where the money is).
